name: wgrib2
description:
The wgrib2 package functionality for interacting with, reading, writing,
and manipulating GRIB2 files.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: ip2
dependencies.description:
The NCEP general interpolation library 2 (ip2lib) contains Fortran 90
subprograms to be used for interpolating between nearly all grids used
at NCEP. This library is deprecated; all functionality has been moved to
the ip library. This is part of the NCEPLIBS project.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: netcdf-c
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependencies.name: netcdf-fortran
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the Fortran
distribution.

dependencies.name: sp
dependencies.description:
The spectral transform library splib contains FORTRAN subprograms to be
used for a variety of spectral transform functions. This is part of the
NCEPLIBS project.

dependent_to.name: ufs-utils
dependent_to.description:
The UFS Utilities package contains programs set up the model grid and
create coldstart initial conditions.
